placeallAmry() - Method in class com.appriskgame.controller.Player
This method is used place all the remaining armies randomly to each player in a round robin fashion

placeArmies(GameMap, GamePlayer) - Method in class com.appriskgame.strategy.RandomPlayer
this method place armies on a random country owned by the player.
placearmyassigned(GamePlayer, String) - Method in class com.appriskgame.controller.Player
This method is used to place army individually to player's country
Player - Class in com.appriskgame.controller
This class contains methods which will take the input to add or remove players , Populate countries to players randomly , to allocate armies to the players initially and then place the remaining armies in round robin fashion.

This Method is used to Add and remove players to playerList.

playersChoiceList - Static variable in class com.appriskgame.strategy.Human
 
playersList - Variable in class com.appriskgame.controller.Player
 
PlayerStrategy - Interface in com.appriskgame.strategy
This interface defines the player strategy to be used by all the types of players.

This method is used to assign countries to the players Random allocation of countries to players will take place in this method.
